trans-unit.source: Specifies the audit behavior of security events.
In general, the security events consist of authentication events such as transport, message or negotiate authentication and authorization event.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceAuthorizationManager"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior"></xref> class.

The instance is created with the following default settings: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation>; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.SuppressAuditFailure%2A> = `true`; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.ServiceAuthorizationAuditLevel%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>; - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.MessageAuthenticationAuditLevel%2A> = <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>.
Gets or sets the location where secure-related event logs are written.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.
The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""></xref> are not valid members of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation"></xref>.
Gets or sets the type of authentication events to audit at the message level.
One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref> enumeration values.
The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""></xref> are not valid members of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
Gets or sets the type of authorization events to audit at the service level.
One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref> enumeration values.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_value" name="value" href=""></xref> are not valid members of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether failure to audit affects the application.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if failure to audit does not affect the application; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Passes custom data to binding elements to support the contract implementation.
Use this method to add custom data objects to the `parameters` collection that binding elements can use to acquire extra information to enable them to support the contract.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of the service.
The host of the service.
The service endpoints.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection>.
and parameters are .

Provides the ability to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.
Use this method to inspect or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> object that is being constructed to support some custom execution scenario.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of the service.
The host of the service.
serviceHostBase is .
Not implemented.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of the service.
The host of the service.
